message: Let's split the money with a 3:1 ratio. I'll take 75$, you take 25$. It's fair considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'll take 60, you take 40. It's a fair compromise considering the inflation rate.
Considering the inflation, I propose we split the money with an even greater gap. I'll take 80$, you take 20$. This maintains the diminishing value of money for both of us.
I'll take 40, you take 60. It's a more balanced split considering the increasing gap due to inflation, and it's still better than the 20% I would get if we continue to the next round.
